message:
SYSTEM: RicoMayo2018.pdf: Página 13
Features
• Instance-based features
• Direct: M1, M2, M3, M4. Values: integer
• Indirect: C1, C2, C3, C4. Values: float in [0-1]
• C1= M2/M1
• C2 = M3/M1
• C3 = C3(EN) = M4(EN)/M1
• C4 = C3(ES) = M4(ES)/M1
• Schema-based features
• TB1 to TB11. Values 0/1
speaker: SYSTEM
